properties.name: firefly.session-manager.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the session manager.

properties.name: firefly.session-manager.max-concurrent-sessions
properties.description: Maximum number of concurrent sessions per user.

properties.name: firefly.session-manager.cache.l1.maximum-size
properties.description: Maximum number of entries in L1 cache.

properties.name: firefly.session-manager.cache.l1.expire-after-write
properties.description: Expire after write time in minutes for L1 cache.

properties.name: firefly.session-manager.cache.l1.expire-after-access
properties.description: Expire after access time in minutes for L1 cache.

properties.name: firefly.session-manager.cache.l2.ttl-minutes
properties.description: TTL for L2 cache entries in minutes.

properties.name: firefly.session-manager.client.reference-master-data-api-base-path
properties.description: Base path for reference master data API.
